name: Fédération Européenne des Fabricants d'Aliments Composés
goal:
FEFAC's mission is to

- represent, defend and promote the interests of the European compound feed industry to the European Institutions;
- lobby for a legislative framework and its implementation, without discrimination in EU Member States so as to maximise market opportunities for EU compound feed companies;
- safeguard conditions of free access to raw materials, the proper functioning of their markets and the definition of their quality;
- develop professional rules and good manufacturing practices that ensure the quality and the safety of compound feed;
- encourage the sustainable development of animal productions responding to the market requirements, so as to maximise market opportunities for EU compound feed companies.
- encourage the development of precompetitive European feed-related Research & Development projects seeking to enhance the EU feed & livestock sectors competitiveness and capacity to innovate in and/or transfer science and technology based solutions to improve the sustainability of resource efficient livestock production systems.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
